definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Fight the rapids as you kayak and raft down the vast Mekong River.
sentences.chinese: 当你的皮船和木筏冲进湄公河时和急流的艰险战斗。

sentences.english: The raft was buoyed up by empty petrol cans .
sentences.chinese: 这木筏依靠空汽油桶的浮力漂浮。

sentences.english: He soon discovered that the other rafting group was not licensed to be on the river that day.
sentences.chinese: 他很快发现另一队木筏那天是不允许在河上走了。

sentences.english: “It’s my first rafting trip,” I said.
sentences.chinese: “这是我第一次做木筏，”我说道。

sentences.english: Suddenly, we noticed another group of rafts coming from the opposite river.
sentences.chinese: 突然，我们注意到从对面那条河上漂过来一组木筏。

sentences.english: The raft bore us across the river.
sentences.chinese: 我们用木筏渡过那条河。

sentences.english: Cosette, that charming existence, was the raft of this shipwreck.
sentences.chinese: 珂赛特，这个可爱的生命，是沉溺者得救的木筏。

sentences.english: Huck lay on the raft in the sun until he was dry.
sentences.chinese: 哈克在阳光下躺在木筏上，一直躺到全身都干了。

sentences.english: We rafted our baggage across the river.
sentences.chinese: 我们用木筏将行李运过河去。

sentences.english: The raft came close to the rocks and then sheered away.
sentences.chinese: 这条木筏划近岩礁，然后迅速转向避开。

sentences.english: You guessed it, he chose white-water rafting.
sentences.chinese: 你猜什么，他选择了溪涧木筏。

sentences.english: They traveled down the river ona wooden raft.
sentences.chinese: 他们乘坐木筏顺江流而下。

sentences.english: As our scouts reported, the last crossed the river on rafts in the night.
sentences.chinese: 据侦察兵报告，最后一批法国佬在深夜乘木筏渡河了。

sentences.english: He promised to confine his group to the left side of the river for the rest of the day.
sentences.chinese: 他保证接下来他的木筏会限制在河道左边活动。

definition: the bow or prow of a ship
